metadata.title: CVE-2022-48908 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: arcnet: com20020: Fix null-ptr-deref in com20020pci_probe()During driver initialization, the pointer of card info, i.e. thevariable 'ci' is required. However, the definition of'com20020pci_id_table' reveals that this field is empty for somedevices, which will cause null pointer dereference when initializingthese devices.The following log reveals it:[    3.973806] KASAN: null-ptr-deref in range[0x0000000000000028-0x000000000000002f][    3.973819] RIP: 0010:com20020pci_probe+0x18d/0x13e0 [com20020_pci][    3.975181] Call Trace:[    3.976208]  local_pci_probe+0x13f/0x210[    3.977248]  pci_device_probe+0x34c/0x6d0[    3.977255]  ? pci_uevent+0x470/0x470[    3.978265]  really_probe+0x24c/0x8d0[    3.978273]  __driver_probe_device+0x1b3/0x280[    3.979288]  driver_probe_device+0x50/0x370Fix this by checking whether the 'ci' is a null pointer first.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48908` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
